title: What are the classes or grades of Mason artisans and their job description and evaluation? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you mean bricklayer masons. Then as I am From the UK I like our grades of bricklayers. It’s nice and simple. Good bricklayer, shit bricklayer and occasionally a very good bricklayer. None of that American nonsense, ‘’Master Bricklayer’’ (although there are a few idiots here who try to use it) if you call yourself a Bricklayer, Carpenter, Plumber or any type of tradesman. You should be able to do the job properly otherwise your a handyman.
